articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Blasts Australia's Human Rights Abuses
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Blasts Australia's Human Rights Abuses
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA Friday in connection with the fact that serious human rights abuses have been disclosed in Australia:
					 A report of an international human rights organization revealed that Australia applied harsh punishment system to child terror suspects within the country and even used such "horrible way" of suffocating them with tear gas. It was also disclosed that it is treating in a harsh and insulting way refugees and asylum seekers at refugee camps it set up on an island in Papua New Guinea and in Nauru.
					
					 The report strongly denounced Australia for not acknowledging its human rights abuses and not abolishing refugee camps as it had promised.
					
					 The human rights abuses committed by Australia are modern-day human rights crimes putting the crimes committed by the Hitler hangmen in Oswiecim concentration camp into the shade, and they deserve denunciation by all people and countries of the world valuing human rights.
					
					 Australia should not try to hide its human rights abuses but lend an ear to the world criticism and reveal the situation of the refugee camps before the world and make those responsible for it face justice.
					
					 Australia is finding fault with "human rights abuses" of other countries on the international arena and calling for sanctions and pressure. This reminds one of a thief crying "Stop the thief!"
					
					 It is an insult to the international conventions on human rights and an act of disgracing the UN for such human rights abuser as Australia to try to become a member of the UN Human Rights Council.
					
					 Australia has to immediately stop horrible human rights abuses before faulting "human rights issue" of others and delivering admonition on them.

articles.title: Ryugyong Kimchi Factory Inaugurated
articles.content:
Ryugyong Kimchi Factory Inaugurated
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- Ryugyong Kimchi Factory went operational in a suburb of Pyongyang with due ceremony on Friday.
					 The appearance of the factory, where the production of kimchi is put on an industrial and scientific basis, laid a firm foundation for producing varieties of fresh kimchi and processed vegetables all the year round.

articles.title: Endless Stream of People Visit Youth Movement Museum
articles.content:
Endless Stream of People Visit Youth Movement Museum
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- It is one year since the establishment of the Youth Movement Museum in Pyongyang.
					 More than 170,000 servicepersons and civilians from all walks of life and school youth and children have visited the museum since its opening.
					
					 The museum deals with the feats President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed by starting the Juche-oriented youth movement and unfolding the history of building a youth power.
					
					 On display there are photos of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un guiding the work of youth and historical data and mementoes.
					
					 Through their visits to the museum the people grasp the truth that the Korean youth movement is the glorious Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist youth movement which was started and developed thanks to the outstanding idea of the great leaders and under their wise guidance and the youth power is Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's youth power built thanks to the profound trust and loving care of the peerlessly great men.
					
					 After looking round the museum, overseas compatriots and foreign friends were deeply moved by the peerlessly great men's politics of prioritizing the youth. And they said that the future of the DPRK is rosy as it has a large contingent of young people intensely loyal to the idea and cause of the leader, a huge army of iron-willed youth.

articles.title: System for Producing Polypropylene Fiber Established in DPRK
articles.content:
System for Producing Polypropylene Fiber Established in DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- The Namhung Youth Chemical Complex of the DPRK has established a system for producing polypropylene fiber conducive to improving the people's living standard.
					 The complex has been remodeled with fiber production, spinning and other processes.
					
					 Researchers of Kim Il Sung University and technicians of the complex realized the home production of raw materials of polypropylene fiber by developing the fourth generation of polymerization catalyst with their own technology and establishing its production process.
					
					 By doing so, they opened a prospect to boost the production of quality hosiery yarn and other raw materials for light industry. 
					
					 They conducted several tests at the end of last year through which they proved that all technical indices are on high level and some of them surpass the developed countries. 
					
					 Now, the workers of the complex are speeding up the preparations for producing polypropylene fiber to make greater progress in improving the people's living standard, in hearty response to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's New Year Address.

articles.title: System for Supplying Water with Oxygen for Fish Farming Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
System for Supplying Water with Oxygen for Fish Farming Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- The Electronic Institute under the State Academy of Sciences of the DPRK has succeeded in developing a system for supplying water with oxygen and introducing it into fish farming.
					 The domestic system is estimated at the Pyongyang Catfish Farm, the Samchon Catfish Farm and other fish farms throughout the country as it is incomparably superior to the previous ones in efficiency, reliability, serviceable life, cost and all other aspects.
					
					 It is helpful to putting fish farming on an intensive basis.
					
					 Ryo Hyo Jong, director of the institute, told KCNA that the stability and effectiveness of the system have been fully proven in on-spot tests.

articles.title: U.S. Smear Campaign against DPRK Will Never Work: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Smear Campaign against DPRK Will Never Work: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) - Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article cites facts to prove that during Obama's tenure of office, the U.S. has gone all the more reckless in the smear campaign for hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and tarnishing the image of Korean-style socialism.
					 The article says:
					
					 The anti-DPRK human rights campaign of the U.S., however, only helped the DPRK consolidate its position as a nuclear weapons state.
					
					 There sprang up modern baby homes and orphanages in different parts of the country while children and old persons were forsaken by society and driven into pitfalls of crimes and degeneration in the U.S. and other Western countries.
					
					 Many residents were hit hard by flooding in Rason City and various parts of North Hamgyong Province all of a sudden but they  were so happy as to move to better houses than ever before thanks to the great will of the Party to protect the living of the people.
					
					 The world clearly realized that the genuine rights of the people are guaranteed in the DPRK.
					
					 During Obama's office the U.S. has escalated the false propaganda to paint the DPRK as a harasser of peace.
					
					 Whenever the DPRK took a measure for self-defence, Washington termed it illegal and "a threat" to the world.
					
					 It has run the whole gamut of sleight of hand to slander the DPRK through Western media but its propaganda only self-exposed that the U.S. is a true disturber of peace and stability and aggressor.
					
					 The U.S. scenario to make profound confusing of right and wrong ended in a total failure. 
					
					 Its attempt to do harm to the DPRK through rhetoric is as foolish an act as beating the air.

articles.title: No One Can Find Fault with DPRK's Test-fire of ICBM: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
No One Can Find Fault with DPRK's Test-fire of ICBM: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- The U.S. deputy secretary of State blustered that the DPRK's threat has reached an alarming phase and sanctions and pressure upon it would go on no matter what administration may emerge in the U.S. as regards the DPRK's entry into the final stage in preparation for the test launch of ICBM.
					 Rodong Sinmun on Friday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 It is a righteous self-defensive measure for the DPRK to test-launch its ICBM as part of its measures for bolstering up the military capability to cope with the U.S. daily-increasing threat of nuclear war. Therefore, no one can find fault with this.
					
					 The U.S. is wholly to blame for pushing the DPRK to developing ICBM as it has desperately pursued its anachronistic policy hostile toward the DPRK for decades to encroach upon its sovereignty and vital rights.
					
					 The U.S. is not entitled to grumble about the DPRK's test-fire of inter-continental ballistic racket, to say nothing of more powerful weapons, to react to its nuclear blackmail.
					
					 The DPRK, a responsible nuclear weapons state, will never remain a passive onlooker to the daily-increasing nuclear war danger on the Korean peninsula. It will redouble its efforts to put an end to the source of nuclear threat and blackmail.
					
					 Its test-launch of ICBM is part of a series of measures for bolstering up the self-defensive military capability to cope with the U.S. daily-increasing nuclear war threat.
					
					 No matter what others may say, ICBM will be launched anytime and anywhere determined by the supreme leadership of the DPRK.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Authorities' Anti-DPRK Smear Campaign
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Authorities' Anti-DPRK Smear Campaign
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- All sorts of campaigns of the south Korean authorities for slandering the ideology and social system of the other side and escalating the confrontation are the source of deteriorating the inter-Korean relations, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article.
					 It goes on: 
					
					 With no rhetoric can the puppet forces justify their smear campaign against the north.
					
					 The DPRK repeatedly proposed the south Korean authorities to stop mud-slinging at it and has made sincere efforts to defuse the distrust and antagonism between the north and the south and took the initiative of creating the atmosphere of improving the relations.
					
					 However, the puppet group has persistently resorted to a frantic smear campaign and sinister conspiratorial racket against the north, far from working hard to create the atmosphere of mending the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The present catastrophe of the inter-Korean relations is chiefly attributable to the blatant challenge of the Park Geun Hye group of traitors to the sincere and patriotic efforts of the compatriots in the north for achieving national reconciliation and unity and opening up a broad avenue to improved relations by halting all sorts of smear campaigns getting on the nerves of the other side and stirring up confrontation.
					
					 It is impossible to defuse the distrust and antagonism between the north and the south and open up the road to dialogue and improved inter-Korean relations as long as the south Korean authorities persist in their malignant mud-slinging, conspiratorial racket and hostile acts aimed at insulting and hurting the north and seeking "unification of social systems."
					
					 The puppet authorities are wholly responsible for putting under control the tragic situation they created by pushing the inter-Korean relations to the worst catastrophe in history.
					
					 It is the aspiration of the era and the wishes of all Koreans to see inter-Korean relations mended.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should immediately stop all sorts of smear campaigns and conspiratorial rackets escalating the distrust and confrontation between the north an the south and make a bold decision to totally roll back their policy of confrontation.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Pressing forward "State-Compiled History Textbooks"
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Pressing forward "State-Compiled History Textbooks"
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- The south Korean paper Hangyore on Jan. 19 carried an editorial denouncing the puppet Ministry of Education for seeking to push forward the "system of introducing state-compiled history textbooks".
					 Despite of the people's strong opposition, the ministry brought together principals of schools in different parts of south Korea on Jan. 18 in a bid to stage the farce of applying for the establishment of "an institute for studying state- compiled textbooks".
					
					 The editorial denounced the ministry's action as the height of irresponsibility as it creates confusion in education, following a tiny handful of Park Geun Hye forces.
					
					 It urged the "National Assembly" to take a special measure to prevent harm to schools.

articles.title: S. Korea: Judicial Authorities' Unjust Handling of Conglomerate's Scandal Denounced
articles.content:
S. Korea: Judicial Authorities' Unjust Handling of Conglomerate's Scandal Denounced
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- The office of the spokesman for the recovery and well-being party in south Korea released a commentary denouncing the puppet Seoul Central District Court for turning down the warrant of arrest for the vice-chairman of Samsung Electronics suspected of paying bribes to Park Geun Hye. 
					 In protest against this, people of broad strata have expressed indignation, it recalled, terming it the worst humiliating act of the judicial authorities. 
					
					 The case will spark off fiercer candlelight actions of people for defending justice, the commentary warned.

articles.title: S. Korea: Publication of Results of Investigation into Pollution Demanded
articles.content:
S. Korea: Publication of Results of Investigation into Pollution Demanded
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty in south Korea and the Inhabitants Association for Properly Retaking U.S. Military Base in Ryongsan began a demonstration in Seoul on Jan. 18, demanding the publication of the results of  investigation into the environmental pollution inside the base.
					 The protesters denounced the Ministry of Environment for having refused to make public the investigation results though the Seoul High Court ruled last year that the results should be made public.
					
					 What is more important is people's life, they said, declaring that they would carry on a sustained struggle.

articles.title: Remarks Demanding Withdrawal of Girl Statue Assailed
articles.content:
Remarks Demanding Withdrawal of Girl Statue Assailed
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- The Korean democratic women's union in Japan and the south Korean democratic women's association in Japan made public a joint statement in protest against the reckless remarks made by the chief of the central headquarters of the south Korean Residents Association in Japan as regards a girl statue outside the Japanese consulate general in Pusan of south Korea.
					 The statement censured the chief as a lackey of the Park Geun Hye regime and the Japanese authorities keen to cover up Japan's state- sponsored unethical crimes.
					
					 It stressed that the girl statue can never be withdrawn unless the issue of the sexual slavery is settled in a proper manner.
					
					 It strongly demanded that the chief immediately retract his remarks and apologize to the world fair-minded people including the Koreans in Japan and all other Koreans desirous of solution to the issue.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Algeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Algeria
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding the Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" was brought out in booklet by the Tarzalt Publishing House in El-Djezair of Algeria with due ceremony on Jan. 8.
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies that it is the principled requirement for victoriously advancing the cause of the Korean revolution to hold leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea. And it indicates the tasks for steadily strengthening the WPK into the glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Letter Introduced in Belarus
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Letter Introduced in Belarus
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- "On Improving the Role of the UAWK in Accomplishing the Juche-Oriented Socialist Cause", a letter sent by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un to those attending the 8th Congress of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea (UAWK), was carried on the January issue of a newspaper in Belarus.
					 The work, published on Dec. 6, Juche 105 (2016), clarifies that the UAWK is a mass political organization of the Korean socialist agricultural workers, founded and developed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, and a reliable transmission belt and peripheral organization of the Party.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks facing the union.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to be Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to be Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary (Day of the Shining Star) of leader Kim Jong Il was inaugurated in the African Regional Committee of Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People on Jan. 12.
					 Damian Ogbonna, co-chairman of the International Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt Paektu, chairman of the African Regional Committee of Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People and national chairman of the People's Progressive Party of Nigeria, was elected chairman of the above-said preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold various political and cultural events praising the exploits of Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and supporting the Korean army and people's righteous cause for the sovereignty of the country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised Abroad
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- There are many famous state leaders in the world, but no one performed such great exploits that will go down through centuries under the worst situation as HE Kim Jong Il did.
					 This was mentioned in a special press statement published at an inaugural meeting of the preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il held by the African Regional Committee of Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People on January 12.
					
					 Noting that the world progressives will soon celebrate the 75th birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il, the eternal leader of the Workers' Party of Korea, the statement said:
					
					 All people highly praise HE Kim Jong Il as he was a prominent statesman intensely loyal to the idea and cause of the preceding leader and propelled the victorious advance of socialism with his distinguished leadership ability and laid a solid foundation for building a socialist power in Korea to give the world people confidence that truth would surely win.
					
					 The DPRK, a small country in territory and population, has invariably advanced along the road chosen by itself, demonstrating its might as a nuclear power despite the obstructions of the imperialist allied forces. This is the fruition of the wise leadership of HE Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The mode of leadership of HE Kim Jong Il, who further cemented single-minded unity and built up the tremendous national strength without any help from others, under the unprecedented military threat and economic blockade by the imperialists, should be embodied in all African countries.
					
					 His undying exploits for prosperity of socialist Korea and global independence will be deeply engraved on the hearts of all people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Celebrated in Ethiopia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Celebrated in Ethiopia
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il was inaugurated in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia on January 11.
					 Nigatu Dagnachew Cherinet, co-chairman of the African Regional Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt Paektu, was elected chairman of the above-said preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold colorful political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star, his birth anniversary.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Studied Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Studied Abroad
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- Seminars and reading sessions on the New Year Address of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un took place in Austria, Spain, Egypt and Tanzania between January 4 and 9.
					 Present at the events were personages and other peoples from different walks of life in those countries.
					
					 The chief of the Youth Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in Austria said as follows, expressing full support for the New Year Address of Kim Jong Un:
					
					 We are sure that the Korean people will work fresh miracles and feats under the wise guidance of the Workers' Party of Korea in the new year, too.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean authorities should stop the dangerous war exercises for aggression being staged on the Korean peninsula every year.
					
					 The Korean people will surely build a prosperous and powerful, reunified country by meeting the challenges of the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad.
					
					 The chief of the Madrid Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Spain and other speakers said the New Year Address of Kim Jong Un is the guidelines showing the road ahead of the Korean people and the world progressives. The New Year Address helped us have good understanding of his idea and intention, they added.
					
					 The chairman of the Egyptian Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea who doubles as the chairman of the Egypt-Korea Friendship Association and the vice-chairman of the Tanzanian National Coordinating Committee of the Juche Idea Study Groups said that Kim Jong Un's New Year Address is a great programme indicating the tasks for building a socialist power and achieving the independent reunification of Korea. This year, too, the Korean people will dynamically wage an all-out general offensive for implementing the five-year strategy of national economic development, advanced by the Workers' Party of Korea, united close around their leader, they stressed.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Hailed by Venezuelan and Nepali Figures
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Hailed by Venezuelan and Nepali Figures
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- Venezuelan and Nepali personages made public statements on Jan. 5 and 6 in support of the New Year Address of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					 Omar Lopez, chairman of the Venezuelan National Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, said:
					
					 The DPRK holds the position of a power in the world and those hostile countries dare not deny this.
					
					 Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address reviewed the successes achieved in bolstering up nuclear force for self-defence and in the field of space science last year.
					
					 Preceding leaders of the DPRK, President Kim Il Sung and HE Kim Jong Il made great contributions to the building of a great prosperous country.
					
					 Now many countries of the world are not optimistic about the economic prospect in the new year. However, Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un indicated the ways for radical development in all fields of the country in 2017.
					
					 The DPRK will become a socialist power in the near future under his leadership.
					
					 Extending best wishes to Marshal Kim Jong Un, Manju Ratna Sakya, vice-director of the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea and chairman of the Nepal Journalist Association, said:
					
					 We fully support the proposal for Korea's reunification and the DPRK's foreign policy clarified by HE Marshal Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.
					
					 We extend firm solidarity to the Korean people working hard to build a socialist power and achieve the national reunification as early as possible under his wise leadership.

articles.title: Mexican Party, Organizations Call for Support to Just Struggle of Korean People
articles.content:
Mexican Party, Organizations Call for Support to Just Struggle of Korean People
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- Mexican party and organizations made public a joint statement on January 13 in support of the New Year Address of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					 They are the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, Mexican National Coordinating Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, Mexican Friend Association for Memory of President Kim Il Sung and Leader Kim Jong Il, Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea, Mexican Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification and the Mexico-Korea Friendship Association.
					
					 The statement noted that Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address advanced the tasks and ways for concentrating all efforts on the implementation of the five-year strategy for national economic development and an important line for improving the inter-Korean relations and achieving peace and reunification of the Korean peninsula.
					
					 He declared that the DPRK would continue to build up its capabilities for self-defence, the core of which is the nuclear force, and the capability for preemptive strike as long as the U.S. and its vassal forces keep on nuclear threat and blackmail and war games at the doorstep of the DPRK under the veil of annual ones, the statement said, adding:
					
					 This is a declaration that deals a telling blow to the U.S. imperialists and gives confidence and courage to the world progressives aspiring after independence.
					
					 We will extend full support and solidarity to the struggle of the Korean people for opening up a broad avenue to independent reunification this year marking the 45th anniversary of the historic July 4 joint statement and the 10th anniversary of the October 4 declaration.
					
					 We call upon the world progressives desirous of independence and justice to reject the U.S. and its vassal forces' persistent moves to stifle the DPRK and "human rights" rackets and send support and solidarity to the Korean people's just struggle for the country's sovereignty and the nation's right to existence.

articles.title: Vocero de cancilleria coreana condena caso de violacion de DDHH en Australia
articles.content:
Vocero de cancilleria coreana condena caso de violacion de DDHH en Australia
Pyongyang, 20 de enero (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que se ha revelado el caso de violacion flagrante de DDHH de Australia, el vocero del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio hoy a la ACNC la siguiente respuesta:
					A traves del informe de una entidad internacional de DDHH, se conocio que Australia aplica el mas cruel sistema de castigo contra los ninos sospechosos de terrorismo y emplea hasta la "manera horrible" de asfixiarles con la bomba lacrimogena.
					
					Ademas, trata de modo cruel e insultante a los refugiados y los solicitantes de asilo en los campos de concentracion de los refugiados, instalados en una isla de Papua Nueva Guinea y Nauru. 
					
					El informe critico fuertemente que Australia no reconoce sus actos violadores de DDHH ni cierra los campos de concentracion incumpliendo su promesa.
					
					Tales casos de Australia merecen la condena de todos los paises y pueblos del mundo que aprecian los derechos humanos porque son crimenes antieticos de version moderna de que se sentirian verguenza hasta los verdugos de Hitler que cometieron barbaridades en el campo de concentracion en OÂ´swiecim durante la segunda guerra mundial. 
					
					Australia no debe encubrir tercamente sus actos violadores de DDHH sino escuchar las criticas internacionales, dar a la publicidad a todo el mundo la situacion de los campos de concentracion y castigar a los responsables. 
					
					A pesar de su situacion, ese pais reclama la sancion y presion contra otros paises acusandolos del "problema de DDHH" en el escenario internacional de DDHH, al igual que el bandido que quiere golpear primero a la victima.
					
					Para colmo, trata de hacerse miembro del Consejo de DDHH de la ONU, lo que es una conducta vergonzosa que insulta a las convenciones internacionales de DDHH y mancha el nombre de la ONU.
					
					En vez de hablar del "problema de DDHH" de otros y hacerles mandatos, Australia debe parar ahora mismo sus atroces actos anti-DDHH.

articles.title: Inaugurada la Fabrica de Kimchi Ryugyong
articles.content:
Inaugurada la Fabrica de Kimchi Ryugyong
Pyongyang, 20 de enero (ACNC) -- Quedo inaugurada la Fabrica de Kimchi Ryugyong construida en las afueras de esta capital. 
					Gracias a la construccion de la planta donde la produccion de kimchi se realiza de modo industrial y cientifico, se ha sentado la firme base para preparar en todas las estaciones del ano las variedades de ese plato tradicional y las hortalizas procesadas y suministrarlas a los habitantes. 
					
					La ceremonia de inauguracion tuvo lugar el dia 20.

articles.title: Nadie puede criticar el lanzamiento de prueba de ICBM de RPDC: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Nadie puede criticar el lanzamiento de prueba de ICBM de RPDC: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 20 de enero (ACNC) -- En relacion con que marchan en la etapa final los preparativos de lanzamiento de prueba del cohete balistico intercontinental de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el subsecretario de Estado de EE.UU. disparateo que llega al extremo la "amenaza" de la RPDC y continuaran como ahora la sancion y presion contra esta en cualquier administracion norteamericana. 
					El lanzamiento de prueba de ICBM es una justa medida para fortalecer la capacidad de autodefensa nacional frente a la creciente amenaza de guerra nuclear de EE.UU. 
					
					Insiste asi el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual publicado este viernes y continua:
					
					El autor que empujo a la RPDC al desarrollo de cohete balistico intercontinental es precisamente EE.UU. que durante varios decenios, vino recurriendo a la brutal y anacronica politica de hostilidad a fin de violar la soberania y el derecho a la subsistencia de la nacion coreana. 
					
					EE.UU. no tiene nada que decir aunque la RPDC fabrique y pruebe un arma mas poderosa que el ICBM frente al chantaje nuclear del primero. 
					
					Siendo poseedora responsable de armas nucleares, la RPDC no estara nunca con brazos cruzados ante el peligro de guerra nuclear que se hace cada dia mas fuerte en la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Se multiplicaran los esfuerzos de ella por eliminar de raiz la amenaza y chantaje nucleares. 
					
					Digan lo que digan otros, el cohete balistico internacional de nuestro pais se lanzara en cualquier momento y desde cualquier lugar que decida nuestra Direccion Suprema.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena demagogia anti-RPDC de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena demagogia anti-RPDC de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 20 de enero (ACNC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun divulgo hoy un articulo individual que citando datos, denuncia que durante el mandato de Obama, Estados Unidos recrudecio la propaganda tendenciosa encaminada a difamar la maxima dignidad de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la imagen del socialismo de ella.
					El complot anti-RPDC de EE.UU. en el tema de derechos humanos forzo a la primera a consolidar su posicion de poseedora de armas nucleares, adelanta el articulista y continua:
					
					Mientras en EE.UU. y otros paises occidentales los ninos y ancianos, marginados de la sociedad, se convierten en criminales y deformados, por doquier de nuestro pais se construyeron los hospicios y orfanatos.
					
					Los habitantes de la ciudad de Rason y las zonas septentrionales de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte, atacadas por las inundaciones inesperadas, se mudaron a las nuevas y mejores viviendas gracias a la voluntad de nuestro partido de responsabilizarse por el destino del pueblo.
					
					El mundo vio que los derechos del pueblo se garantizan sustancialmente en la RPDC.
					
					Durante el mandato de Obama, EE.UU. endurecio la demagogia destinada a estigmatizar a la RPDC como perturbadora de paz.
					
					Cada vez que la RPDC tomaba las medidas de autodefensa, EE.UU. las califico de ilegales y "amenaza" al mundo.
					
					Aunque el imperio difundio muchos embustes por conducto de los medios de prensa occidentales, se produjo el resultado contrario de revelar su naturaleza de perturbador de paz y estabilidad y agresor.
					
					Asi EE.UU. sufrio gran derrota en su intento de calumniar a la RPDC.
